description.originalText: Mynette is truly a professional, experienced, and skilled caregiver. She took care of my infant twins for six months. Mynette was always looking out for their best interest, even if it wasn’t easy. For example, she made sure the twins got plenty of tummy time and played with them (instead of taking the easy road and just having them sleep all day).  Her diaper changing skills her perfect and she helped heal a rash that one of them had before she started. Mynette also helped me put the twins on a schedule when she saw I was having a hard time managing them. Her experience really shines when you see her at work and everything looks so easy for her.  Playing, napping, feeding, bathing them effortlessly and lovingly. And at the end of the day I would get back happy little babies who had full days and thus slept well at night. She’s also very punctual and communicative!

description.displayText: We hired Mynette to provide overnight care for our 9 month old when we were visiting New York for the holidays. I was very happy with her timeliness, flexibility accommodating us over the holidays and over different locations we stayed in NY. She is great with communication, following our son's routine and gave us tips on what worked well and what didn't in trying to maintain his sleep training routine. I'd definitely hire Mynette again if we're around the area. Thank you Mynette for giving us a stress free vacation.

description.displayText:
We have worked with Mynette since our daughter was just 3 months old. As new parents we really appreciated her experience with newborns, as well as older children. She not only cared for our child's day to day needs, but really pushed her to hit developmental milestones with tools and activities to help guide our child through various stages of development and learning. She also continuously re-assessed toys, feeding methods, and schedules that were age appropriate and geared towards progressing to those next steps. This was extremely helpful, especially as new (and often overwhelmed) parents. 
Mynette creates a warm, caring and safe environment. She is great with getting out to the park and into the playground, play groups, and children's entertainment that takes place there. She reads books, gives hugs, and is extremely compassionate. 
I highly recommend Mynette to parents looking for more than the minimum. Her next family will be lucky to have her!

description.displayText:
Mynette is an amazing care giver, and has been such a critical part of our daughter's development since she was born! 

She has a lot of training and knowledge in safety and best practices for infants and children, and really helped us figure out how to successfully develop our daughter. 

She helped establish routines based on our needs, healthy sleep practices, healthy eating practices, exercises to develop her gross and fine motor skills, and maintaining strong hygiene and a clean and safe environment.

We have a nanny share, so Mynette took care of 2 girls at the same time. We were so impressed by her ability to meet both of their independent needs, while also working with them to team them how to socialize and learn from each other. 

Most importantly, our daughter has such a strong love for Mynette. It is such a comforting and relieving feeling to have someone so reliable and trustworthy to leave our daughter with!
